content: this doily has 19 rounds using 2 strands of size 10 crochet thread with a 3 25 mm hook can be substituted for the size 3 **finished size** 6 in diameter **materials needed** size 3 cotton crochet thread- 20 yards size 10 cotton crochet thread- 50 yards 3 25 mm hook 1 75 mm hook yarn needle scissors
